title: Smart Data Models - ConformLoadGroup
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A group of loads conforming to an allocation pattern.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ConformLoadGroup

ConformLoadSchedules.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The ConformLoadSchedules in the ConformLoadGroup. Default: 'list'

EnergyConsumers.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Conform loads assigned to this ConformLoadGroup. Default: 'list'
